Text.Page:
One of our research objectives is to determine the purpose of the massive metallic mushrooms throughout Tirkai Forest.

We set our finest field researchers to the task. I'd like an update on their progress. I need you to brave the road and collect their reports for me.

Ah, apologies, . A colleague borrowed my notes. Should be nearby, though.

Let me mark that on your map....

Yes, that Report was indispensable to our inquiries.

We've finished with it, but we've written an addendum that clarifies matters. If I can recall who has that....

Yes, indeed. The Tirkai Ecology Report proved most useful for our inquiries.

We no longer need it, but have written an addendum. It would be prudent to include it. It's at this station, here.

True, true, my addendum is quite illuminating, but I no longer possess it.

One of our field teams took it. Let me mark your map.

The contamination addendum? Absolutely.

We made a copy for our use. The director is welcome to the original.

Take it with our thanks.

The contamination addendum? Absolutely.

We made a copy for our use. The director is welcome to the original.

Take it with our thanks.

Excellent work, . I trust the journey wasn't too dangerous?

Once we understand why the argons changed Val Tirkai, we might identify a need to exploit or a vulnerability to target.

The Invalesco thanks you.
I need that research, <PCNAME>. Lives depend on it.
